refnamediv.refpurpose: Interleaves arrays into a a single one by placing the input data in alternate positions.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Takes input arrays, a and b and interleaves their data (placing values in alternating positions).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array containing the interleaved output. It will be created if it does not exist.
kin1[], kin2[] -- input arrays containing the values to be interleaved.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: Here is an example of the interleave opcode. It uses the file interleave.csd.
